class.name: LuaError
class.description: Binds to a existing Lua object and creates a new lua thread with lua_newthread. This is not a typical thread but a coroutine. Instead of executing a file or string directly you load it into the state. Every time the resume method is caleld the lua code will execute untill yield is called from lua.

method.name: bind
method.description: Binds the thread to a lua object. All threads attached to the same object share resources.

method.name: load_string
method.description: Loads a string into the threads state.

method.name: load_file
method.description: Loads a file into the threads state.

method.name: reumse
method.description: Resumes or starts the thread. Will either return a Array of arguments passed by lua in yield() or a LuaError.

method.name: is_done
method.description: Returns true if the thread is finished executing.
